# iLBC

**Enumeration Case**

The internet Low Bitrate Codec (iLBC) narrowband speech format.

## Declaration

```swift
iLBC
```

## Discussion

This format uses no flags.

## Open-Source Formats

- **Opus**: The Opus codec format.
